title: Implement constraint validator
description: Create src/services/validator.ts with functions to validate rows, columns, beams, and 4x4 sub-squares for uniqueness. Use table-driven tests.

title: Write unit tests for validator
description: Create src/services/validator.test.ts with comprehensive constraint checking tests using table-driven approach.

title: Implement backtracking puzzle generator
description: Create src/services/generator.ts with randomized backtracking algorithm to generate valid solved cubes and remove cells based on difficulty.

title: Write unit tests for generator
description: Create src/services/generator.test.ts to verify puzzle uniqueness, solvability, and difficulty calibration.

title: Implement LocalStorage persistence
description: Create src/services/storage.ts for saving/loading full game state to LocalStorage with serialization.

title: Write unit tests for storage
description: Create src/services/storage.test.ts to verify serialization round-trips and state persistence.

title: Phase 4: User Interaction Layer
description: Implement user input handling, cell editing, and game UI components.

title: Implement InputController
description: Create src/ui/InputController.ts to handle mouse events (drag, double-click, scroll) and keyboard input for navigation and editing.

title: Implement CellEditor for value input
description: Create src/ui/CellEditor.ts for hex value input (0-9, a-f), visual feedback for conflicts, and distinguishing Given vs Editable cells.

title: Implement GameUI for HUD and menus
description: Create src/ui/GameUI.ts with home button, Check validation button, win notifications, and difficulty selector.

title: Implement view state transitions
description: Add logic for transitioning between 3D rotational view, face-on editing view, and minimap interactions.

title: Phase 5: Integration and Polish
description: Complete end-to-end integration, win detection, and final testing.

title: Implement win condition detection
description: Add logic to detect complete and correct cube fills, trigger win notification UI.

title: Write integration tests
description: Create integration tests for full game flow: new game → edit → validate → win, and view transitions.

title: Connect all components in main.ts
description: Wire up all models, services, renderers, and UI components in main.ts entry point.

title: Performance optimization pass
description: Profile and optimize rendering performance, z-sorting for translucency, and validation logic.

title: End-to-end playability testing
description: Manual testing of complete game flow, all interactions, edge cases, and browser compatibility.

title: Phase 3: 3D Rendering Layer
description: Implement Three.js rendering system for isometric 3D view, including scene management, cube rendering, and billboard sprites.

title: Implement SceneManager for Three.js
description: Create src/renderer/SceneManager.ts to orchestrate Three.js scene, camera, lighting, and renderer lifecycle.

title: Implement CubeRenderer for isometric view
description: Create src/renderer/CubeRenderer.ts with individual meshes for cells, translucent rendering, and rotation controls (middle-mouse drag).

title: Implement billboard sprite rendering for cell values
description: Add Three.js Sprite rendering for hex values that always face the camera in isometric view.

title: Implement FaceRenderer for face-on editing
description: Create src/renderer/FaceRenderer.ts with orthographic view, layer scrolling (mouse wheel), and discrete layer opacity.

title: Implement MinimapRenderer
description: Create src/renderer/MinimapRenderer.ts for lower-left miniature cube view with face highlighting and color-coded fill visualization.

title: Phase 1: Core Data Models and Testing Infrastructure
Implement Cell model with types and validation
description: Create src/models/Cell.ts with HexValue type, CellType enum, and Cell interface. Include basic validation for hex values (0-9, a-f).

title: Write unit tests for Cell model
description: Create src/models/Cell.test.ts with comprehensive tests for cell creation, value validation, and type checking.

title: Implement Cube model with 16x16x16 grid
description: Create src/models/Cube.ts with 3D array structure, getters for rows/columns/beams/sub-squares, and basic operations.

title: Write unit tests for Cube model
description: Create src/models/Cube.test.ts with tests for grid operations, indexing, and constraint region retrieval.

title: Implement GameState model
description: Create src/models/GameState.ts to manage game session state, difficulty, completion status, and validation results.
